full_text:
GRAFFITI DECLARED A PUBLIC NUISANCE.

	Declaration of Nuisance. The City Council hereby declares and finds graffiti, which is visible from a street or other public or private property to be a nuisance subject to abatement according to the provisions and procedures contained herein.

7.catch_line: Display Of Aerosol Paint Containers And Marker Pens.

8.catch_line: Possession Of Specified Graffiti Implements Prohibited In Designated Areas.

11.catch_line: Remedies When Owner Refuses To Consent.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

GRAFFITI DECLARED A PUBLIC NUISANCE. (§ 49.84.6)

  GRAFFITI DECLARED A PUBLIC NUISANCE.	Declaration of Nuisance. The City
Council hereby declares and finds graffiti, which is visible from a street or
other public or private property to be a nuisance subject to abatement according
to the provisions and procedures contained herein.
